          <title>
            <string language="hu">Csontrepedés és törés</string>
            <string language="en">Cracking and fracture of the bone</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Knacken und Bruch des Knochens</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Fendre et rupture de l'os</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rachar e fratura do osso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Spezzandosi e frattura dell'osso</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ράγισμα και σπάσιμο του κόκκαλου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El quebrarse y fractura del hueso</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A csontsérülések különböző fajtáit bemutató rajz</string>
            <string language="en">Drawing illustrating the different types of bone injuries</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">mozgás,  csontváz,  csonttörés,  elsősegély,  </string>
            <string language="en">movement, skeleton, fracture of bone, first aid</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zeichnen, die unterschiedlichen Typen der 
Knochenverletzungen veranschaulichend</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dessin illustrant les différents types de 
dommages d'os</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Desenhar ilustrando os tipos diferentes dos 
ferimentos do osso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dissipare illustrando i tipi differenti di 
lesioni dell'osso</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχεδιασμός επεξηγώντας τους διαφορετικούς τύπους 
τραυματισμών κόκκαλων</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El trazar ilustrando los diversos tipos de 
lesiones del hueso</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bewegung, Skelett, Bruch des Knochens, Erste ERSTE 
HILFE</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mouvement, squelette, rupture d'os, premiers soins</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">movimento, esqueleto, fratura do osso, primeiros 
socorros</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">movimento, scheletro, frattura dell'osso, pronto 
soccorso</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετακίνηση, σκελετός, σπάσιμο του κόκκαλου, πρώτες 
βοήθειες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">movimiento, esqueleto, fractura del hueso, primeros 
auxilios</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
